name: Snow Dream (CosmoLarius)
description:
Well, my first ever submission for a game jam in my life, a damned prototype.

Gonna give the best out of me to make this game and I WILL FINISH IT(or that's what i think :) )

The game will be a Puzzle-Platformer game and because it was being created for the Mini Jam #42 : Snow , it has place in a snowy location, not sure if it's gonna be a mountain or something like that.

Well Godbai.
